text:
[Swooshipedia frontend/dev] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/150fd76ba31ab58466e917aebed642c3bc98432c|150fd76ba31a>: Hiding dashes in nav items.
 - gastonfig
Saw a question about voices QA card. voices is a case study at the very end of the list on the CMS. Commuting in right now be there ASAP
Yes, I was searching but my browser hadn't loaded the bottom of the infinite scroll so I search couldn't find it. Found it later.
<@U02613K0X> Swish is stuck trying to load hero images for each case study. Was working fine 10 minutes ago.
Seeing that on both Swish and my local server so I imagine I may have something to do with the API.
I'm having laptop issues at the moment but I'll take a look asap
Awesome. Thanks.
<@U02618EV1> case study pages load fine for me
Seem to fine. Have no idea what was going on before.
Other websites were working. Will let you know if I notice that again.
k
<@U02613K0X> Sorry to bug again. Trying to make draft posts show up but I'm having problem with posts of the same name that are deleted or on other states
So the question is, do we need to have those deleted posts listed in the API feed?
there-is-no-finish-line is a good example of this
what do you need?
only published and draft posts?
Yes, if that's all we need to see.
need to see where?
The front-end
We’re showing draft posts on the front end??
No but we need to when previewing posts from the CMS
oh right. so what you want is the campaign feed with only published and draft posts?
Yes, if that's possible and not a big pain :grinning:
you can just use this query to get published and draft campaigns:
<http://swapi.uncorkedstudios.com/campaigns?{%22state%22:{%22$in%22:[%22draft%22,%22published%22]}}|http://swapi.uncorkedstudios.com/campaigns?{"state":{"$in":["draft","published"]}}>
Testing...
Can't seem to make it work

posting here for completeness: <http://swapi.uncorkedstudios.com/campaigns?{%22state%22:{%22$in%22:[%22draft%22,%22published%22]},%22slug%22:%22there-is-no-finish-line%22}|http://swapi.uncorkedstudios.com/campaigns?{"state":{"$in":["draft","published"]},"slug":"there-is-no-finish-line"}>

[Swooshipedia frontend/] 2 new commits:
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/39b95d9223868c096ea0c6433d93bf3d14c93404|39b95d922386>: Cleaned up home helpers code.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/ff616db677b9a6a47c0c69bea6a61ec4909135fb|ff616db677b9>: Making draft posts visible.
 - gastonfig
ordering swoosh trello QA cards now top down from high pri to low pri.
ordered.

there are some cards toward the bottom that aren't clear enough. they were items from engin that i am both, looking into myself to see if I can add more detail, and asking them for more detail as well.
<@U026AP8CM> there are a a few duplicate trello cards that have either been addressed already or I moved into Done last week.
Should I just move them into done or do you want to delete them?
sure! sorry about that.
move them to done
thanks Jenny!
k
done

<@U026AP8CM> Can you confirm if <https://trello.com/c/5CvdHlAY/112-chrome-desktop-arrows-in-articles-not-working-for-the-year-1996-going-forward-displays-different-results-than-going-backwards> is still an issue? Seems like next/prev arrows go to the right case studies.
<@U026AP8CM>:  in your earlier emails you said you needed a build, but then in the latest, you are asking Jenny to scrape the site by EOD.
which is it?  now or by EOD?
EOD is fine, so it's in place for tomorrow morning. Sorry for the confusion.
<@U02613K0X>: doesn't need to do it.  I will use the publishing tool...  which generates a zip for the ipad app and commits the site to the SVN
gotcha, apologies.
no worries...   just needing/wanting to clarify.

<@U02613K0X> here's an odd one for you: <http://swapi.uncorkedstudios.com/campaigns?slug=800-number> has "800-number" under nextCampaign but <http://swapi.uncorkedstudios.com/campaigns?slug=800-number> has "city-attacks" under prev.
about to check it out
Thanks
keep me updated on the progress. if we can close this bug tonight we're in fabulous shape moving forward the rest of the week.
<@U026AP8CM> I know I’ve asked you this before, but do we know the max case studies per year?
roughly
actually!
nvm i don’t need it
okay
if that changes, happy to get that for you.

<@U02618EV1>: earlier I told you I would get clarification on the ambiguous Trello cards from Engin, the ones we needed more detail and/or screenshots for; none of them were open issues, they've all been closed out.
OK
Fixed the case study ordering issue. <@U02618EV1> the way i was giving you the next and prev campaigns was not foolproof but it should be now.
Awesome. Thanks <@U02613K0X> !
thanks <@U02613K0X> !!!

[Swooshipedia frontend/] 13 new commits:
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/608f46973964ad239554ab52a55bc4ededaa608c|608f46973964>: Using the correct images on dual image lightboxes.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/da33b39b41a51626255bf92a7c6b8318e9a2313f|da33b39b41a5>: Scaling landing page type down for smaller devices.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/0cd47ab10e2f05b992a072963fdc1bb7321c0872|0cd47ab10e2f>: Making sure isotope works gain  when filtering after it was destroyed.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/8c7fa394f266f3c8c834035c0e52324917ff4bed|8c7fa394f266>: Removed tag dashes on case studies.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/5bbd340cbcedf419b5ba302c4f5083b8da724a58|5bbd340cbced>: No longer selecting persona on when toggling on the filter nav.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/dd359c2820500daedeafadae12cd13ddba0e5459|dd359c282050>: Made landing page overlay blocks clickable.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/dcd8ad6076a36fae27aa42b87e735bbb2da3107d|dcd8ad6076a3>: Added and styled quote sublines
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/e2675b01a13aa24fd49a658b12d5b5dd0d3723e8|e2675b01a13a>: Centered landing page nav.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/503e44894bf202b5916f9b44c82c161a7d8df0a5|503e44894bf2>: Added next/prev navs to the landing page.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/d8621d174a91aae7a6ebe3eb87238a0d4dd87664|d8621d174a91>: Updated borders on landing page blocks.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/8e0768c1dd11c4b072297ac27d333731cc1f175e|8e0768c1dd11>: Centered decade text.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/23420e653be177f2f5528d90d065376bc60ccbce|23420e653be1>: Removed orange highlight from active nav state.
 - gastonfig
[Swooshipedia frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/swooshipedia-frontend/commits/068c69c7e455cfea29d49b51dd7eeec71954204c|068c69c7e455>: Added landing page logo.
 - gastonfig
